extension.menu:
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Trakt Manager
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,season) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Rescrape Item
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Clear Providers
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Find Similar
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Browse Series
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Browse Episodes

extension.summary: Venom - This Addon is currently in beta. Please be aware there may be bugs present
extension.description: Adds Global Contextual Menu Items for Venom menu items throughout Kodi

extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v3.6.1 - April 14, 2020[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed Calendar show titles.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] fixed typo with RD uncached torrent removal using PM setting.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] fixed issue with RD uncached torrent check failing due to RD response converting hases to lower case.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] fixed Trakt Progress episode sort issue from Trakt response.[/I]

extension.description: Main Repository for Aeon Nox: SiLVO
The Gaia repository for the addon, resources, extensions, and external addons. Any of the Gaia mirror repositories can be used for installation and updates.
extension.disclaimer:
Gaia and its developers are not in any way affiliated with Kodi, Premiumize, OffCloud, RealDebrid, EasyNews, Orion, or any of the sites and providers used in the addon.
Gaia is and always will be free and open-source. None of its code and resources may be sold or redistributed for any commercial purposes.
Gaia and its developers do not host, create, or distribute any of the content displayed in the addon, it simply searches public websites.

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com[CR]www.omdbapi.com[CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
